mapper.select: SELECT cust_nm name , total_price value FROM( SELECT cust_nm , SUM(total_price) total_price FROM( SELECT c.cust_nm , a.sell_quan * b.prod_price total_price FROM sell a LEFT JOIN product_price b ON a.cust_no = b.cust_no AND a.prod_no = b.prod_no AND a.sell_dt BETWEEN b.start_dt AND b.end_dt JOIN customer c ON a.cust_no = c.cust_no WHERE a.sell_dt = '20171205' /*DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d')*/ UNION SELECT c.cust_nm , (a.sell_quan * b.prod_price) * -1 total_price FROM sell a LEFT JOIN product_price b ON a.cust_no = b.cust_no AND a.prod_no = b.prod_no AND a.sell_dt BETWEEN b.start_dt AND b.end_dt JOIN customer c ON a.cust_no = c.cust_no JOIN sell_return f ON a.cust_no = f.cust_no AND a.sell_dt = f.sell_dt AND a.sell_seq = f.sell_seq WHERE a.sell_dt = '20171205' /*DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d')*/ ) K GROUP BY cust_nm ) K ORDER BY total_price DESC LIMIT 5
